thread.title: Trump reaffirms 'one China' policy in call with China's Xi
thread.title_full: Trump reaffirms 'one China' policy in call with China's Xi

title: Trump reaffirms 'one China' policy in call with China's Xi
text: show ad Trump reaffirms 'one China' policy in call with Chinese President Xi in apparent move to soothe tensions over post-election chat with Taiwan leader After his election victory, Trump broke decades-long US policy by fielding congratulatory phone call from the leader of Taiwan, President Tsai Ing-wen The move angered China, which views Taiwan as a renegade province For decades, US has maintained unofficial ties with Taiwan while recognizing Beijing as the sole legitimate government representing China Trump has been critical of China for its policies in trade and the currency markets Published: 04:56 GMT, 10 February 2017 | Updated: 07:05 GMT, 10 February 2017 159 shares
